timeline.message: Added Throwable cause test. Improved log message
Fixed defaults for RetryOptions in local and non local activities

timeline.bodyText: previously we used to return a new copy.  Now we return the same instance back.  Can this cause issues?
timeline.author: samarabbas

replies.bodyText: It is immutable, so no issues expected.
replies.author: mfateev

timeline.bodyText: validateBuildWithDefaults needs to match same validation we do on server sides for activities?
timeline.author: samarabbas

replies.bodyText: Not necessary as it is for local activity only. But I believe they do now.
replies.author: mfateev

timeline.bodyText: I'm confused why no validation here?  I thought this is also all client-side.
timeline.author: samarabbas

replies.bodyText: This records retry options as they are, to ensure determinism if they change.
replies.author: mfateev
